Act2Scene1.speaker: Banquo
Act2Scene1.text: What, sir, not yet at rest? The King’s abed. He hath been in unusual pleasure, and Sent forth great largess to your offices. This diamond he greets your wife withal, By the name of most kind hostess, and shut up In measureless content.

Act2Scene1.speaker: Macbeth
Act2Scene1.text: Being unprepared, Our will became the servant to defect, Which else should free have wrought.

Act2Scene1.speaker: Banquo
Act2Scene1.text: All’s well. I dreamt last night of the three Weïrd Sisters.To you they have showed some truth.

Act2Scene1.speaker: Macbeth
Act2Scene1.text: I think not of them. Yet, when we can entreat an hour to serve, We would spend it in some words upon that business.

Act2Scene1.speaker: Macbeth
Act2Scene1.text: If you shall cleave to my consent, when ’tis, It shall make honor for you.

Act2Scene1.speaker: Banquo
Act2Scene1.text: So I lose none In seeking to augment it, but still keep My bosom franchised and allegiance clear, I shall be counseled.

Act2Scene1.speaker: Banquo
Act2Scene1.text: Thanks, sir. The like to you.
